coded_answer.p: I am sorry to hear that our friend Mr Brown is ill. As our conference is due to start next week I respondwill respond straight away. There areis some informationsinformation you have asked me about. We booked rooms for your group at the Palace Hotel. That is the best option because it is placedsituated less than 5 minutesminutes' walk from the Conference CenterCentreconference centre.

When you liveleave athe hotel you have to turn right and you bloun the street. At the first traffic lights turn right again and you should see a big blue building. That's our Conference CenterCentreconference centre. At the hotel reception you will find printed information about how to get over there.

As you know at the end-of-conferenceend of conferenceend of the conference there is a party. PartyThe party is due to start at 8 p.m. and will last until 3 a.m. There is a 2hr break between the end-of-conferenceend of conferenceend of the conference and the party. At this time you and your group can refresh yourselfyourselves. I would like to mention that because our conference that is dress-code party.
HopeI hope you will enjoy it. We prepared some special attractionattractions, like live dance music and a hot orand cold buffet.
AboutRegarding you'reyour the last question I can sugestsuggest to visitvisiting the Royal Castle. That will give you and your guests an impression about our country and history.

In our town there isare so many interesting places to see that thereit is hard to choose one. In my opinion the most interesting is the Castlecastle. It is placedsituated on a hill so it is very easy to recognizesee whenwhere is itit is.
Just look up and you will see that huge building.
Actually it is a whole complex, the Old and the New Castle, the CathedrallCathedralcathedral and the mostvery interesting undergroudunderground part with it'sits amazing crypts.

And if you climb onto the top of the main tower - the keep - you will see unforgetableunforgettable viewviews onof a white tountown. After that you can explore our great museum at the Old Castle. You will find there an amazing collection of old weaponweapons, armoresarmoursarmour and, we are especially proundproud of it, the great collection of swords.

After that I am sure you will be happy to find a few restaurandsrestaurants located at the New Castle . I am sure that should be enoughtenough for a one dayone-day trip. For youyour information I can say that at this time we have a five weeksfive-week festival and thisthat night there will be a great display. That should complete thatan amazing day.
